Isobu takes over [[Rin Nohara]], causing her to manifest a chakra cloak, and slam the opponent with a chakra tail. Isobu fully manifests itself, slams the opponent underwater, and sends a Tailed Beast Ball their way. Rin manages to suppress Isobu with memories of [[Team Minato|her team]], as a slight shower from the explosion rains down on her.

[[pl:Sanbi Bōsō]]
